I got promoted twice while pumping at work. Women have, on average, 2.5 children over the course of 50 or so years in the workforce. The number of women that will need to pump during work in the same time period in the same workplace is going to be a pretty low percentage. Plus, most employers already do this out of basic human decency. When I worked in an office and pumped twice a day, I took my laptop with me and continued to work. I took way less break time than the smokers.

Do you have State Farm insurance, if you have the towing with them you better cancel it and get a towing card like AAA because if you use it couple of times they will cancel you! Same thing if you have a window replaced! State Farm wants your money but your not suppose to use their insurance! Like that commercial on TV, what the since of having insurance if you can't use it

You are exactly right, ! Not every black person is a criminal, in fact I have several friends who are Doctors and professionals. Not all white people are racist. Not all of us think people who aren't white are inferior. However, unfortunately in this country negativity gets the press. The ones of us who exist side by side and work hard, live within the law, and behave accordingly never make the news. It's a shame because just that would begin to heal the rift that has started to grow between the races. God bless you and yours.

The point is that there were some beta/developing parts of the game that have been shown, based on which the further development phase would be built, depending on the funding. This is such a misleading article. I'm not even into games, but find this highly offensive from an accurate truth point of view. I do hope the title is meant to be read as a sign of hope, people pay that money because they probably want to see the game be made. How can you expect a fully functional game of that size before putting in considerable amounts of money? Just think of the latest GTA with a 1/4 of a billion funding. Have some faith in creativity .
